title:
Temperature Controller, Oil Cooler, Replace (Z20
LET)

steps.text: Remove temperature controller from housing for oil cooler system Note: Note position for installation.

substeps.text: Remove Plug (4), then discard sealing washer (3)

steps.text: Install new temperature controller to housing for oil cooler system Note: Note position for installation.
Run engine and check for leaks, stop engine

substeps.text: Check engine oil level, top up if required

torqueValues.component: Install new temperature controller to housing for oil cooler system Note: Note position for installation.
Install plug 20 Nm + 60° + 30° – Position collecting container

warnings:
A four post hoist must
be used to raise the vehicle when removing the engine undertray.
The vehicle can be moved to a two post hoist for other operations
if required.

Observe relevant
environmental regulations when disposing of used coolant and
lubricants.
